data.current_description: Ajoute ou supprime une liste de numros  un rpertoire existant.
data.summary_suggestion: Add or remove numbers from directory
data.description_suggestion: Adds or removes a list of phone numbers to/from an existing directory. Specify the directory ID and provide the list of numbers to add or remove. Returns confirmation of the operation with the updated directory status. This operation modifies the directory contents and affects future SMS campaign targeting.
data.reasoning: Original summary is vague and uses French abbreviation. Description lacks clarity on what parameters are needed, what is returned, and the side effects of modifying a directory. Added specifics about inputs, outputs, and operational impact for better AI agent understanding.

data.current_summary: Ajoute un numero en liste noire
data.current_description: Ajoute un numero en liste noire. Une fois ajout, les requtes d'envoi de SMS marketing vers ce numro seront refuses.
data.description_suggestion: Adds a phone number to the blacklist. Once added, all marketing SMS send requests to this number will be rejected. Requires the phone number as input. Returns confirmation of the blacklist addition. This operation permanently affects SMS delivery for the specified number until removed from the blacklist.
data.reasoning: Summary uses French and lacks clarity. Description explains the effect but doesn't specify input requirements or return value. Enhanced with explicit input/output details and clarification that this is a persistent state change for better AI agent decision-making.

data.summary_suggestion: Create shortened URL for SMS tracking
data.description_suggestion: Creates a shortened URL for use in SMS messages, enabling click tracking and analytics. Accepts a long URL and optional custom alias in the request. Returns the shortened URL and tracking ID. The shortened link can be included in SMS campaigns to monitor user engagement and click-through rates.

data.description_suggestion: Sends SMS messages to one or multiple recipients in a single request. Requires a list of recipient phone numbers, message content, and sender ID. data.current_summary: Retourne les SMS envoys sur une priode donne
data.current_description:
Retourne les SMS envoys sur une priode donne en fonction d'une date de dbut et d'une date de fin. 

Les dates sont au format YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm. 

Le fichier rapport de campagne est sous la forme d'un fichier zip + contenant un fichier csv contenant le dtail des envois.
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve SMS campaign summary for date range
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a summary report of all SMS messages sent during a specified date range. Requires start date (date_debut) and end date (date_fin) in YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm format. Returns a zipped CSV file containing detailed delivery information for each sent SMS, including recipient, timestamp, and delivery status. Useful for campaign analytics and performance tracking.
data.reasoning: Original description lacks clarity on required parameters and their format. Summary is passive and doesn't clearly indicate the retrieval action. Added specific parameter names, clarified the CSV content within the zip file, and explained the use case for AI agent decision-making.

message: Operation 'comptage' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Original summary and description are too vague and don't explain the actual purpose (SMS segmentation calculation). Missing details about what inputs are expected (message text) and what the output represents (SMS segment count). Added context about SMS length limits and use case for cost estimation.

data.current_description: Compte le nombre de SMS necessaire  un envoi
data.summary_suggestion: Calculate SMS count for message text
data.description_suggestion: Calculates the number of SMS segments required to send a message based on its character count and encoding. Accepts message text and optional parameters for encoding type and special character handling. Returns the total number of SMS units needed for delivery, accounting for SMS length limits (160 characters for standard encoding, 70 for Unicode). Essential for cost estimation before sending campaigns.
data.reasoning: Original summary and description are too vague and don't explain the actual purpose (SMS segmentation calculation). Missing details about what inputs are expected (message text) and what the output represents (SMS segment count). Added context about SMS length limits and use case for cost estimation.

data.current_description: Retourne le credit existant associe au compte.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the current credit balance associated with the authenticated account. Returns the available credit amount in the account's currency. This credit represents the prepaid balance used for SMS sending and other API operations. Useful for monitoring account balance before initiating campaigns.
data.reasoning: Summary uses vague French term 'Interrogation'. Description lacks context about what credit represents and how it's used. Added clarity about authentication requirement, currency context, and practical use case for AI agents.

data.current_summary: Ajoute un numero en liste noire
data.current_description: Supprime un numero en liste noire
data.description_suggestion: Removes a phone number from the blacklist (liste noire). The specified number will no longer be blocked from receiving SMS messages. Requires the phone number to be provided in the request. Returns confirmation of successful removal. Note: This operation deletes from the blacklist; use the appropriate endpoint to add numbers to the blacklist.
data.reasoning: Critical issue: summary says 'Ajoute' (add) but description says 'Supprime' (delete) - contradictory. Summary is inconsistent with the operation's actual purpose. Corrected to reflect deletion operation and added clarification about the blacklist functionality.

message: Operation 'getListeNoire' has semantic quality issues: missing_input_details, missing_output_details. data.current_description: Retourne un fichier csv zipp contenant la liste noire
data.summary_suggestion: Download blacklist as zipped CSV file
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the complete blacklist (liste noire) as a zipped CSV file. The CSV contains all phone numbers currently blocked from receiving SMS messages. Useful for auditing blocked numbers and managing communication restrictions. Returns a downloadable zip archive containing the formatted CSV data.
data.reasoning: Summary has grammatical issue ('le liste' should be 'la liste') and lacks specificity about file format. Description doesn't explain what the blacklist contains or its purpose. Added clarity about content, use case, and file format details.

data.current_description: Ralise un lookup HLR sur les numros
data.summary_suggestion: Perform HLR lookup on phone numbers
data.description_suggestion: Performs an HLR (Home Location Register) lookup on one or more phone numbers to verify their validity and retrieve network information. Accepts phone numbers in international format. Returns detailed information including network operator, roaming status, and number validity. HLR lookup confirms whether a number is active and reachable before sending SMS campaigns, reducing bounce rates.
data.reasoning: Original description is too brief and doesn't explain what HLR lookup does or returns. Summary doesn't mention HLR terminology. Missing details about input format (international format), output information (operator, roaming status), and practical use case. Added comprehensive context for AI agent understanding.
